GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
cgroup: Use separate src/dst nodes when preloading css_sets for migration

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit 7657e3958535d101a24ab4400f9b8062b9107cc4, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit f817de98513d060023be4fa1d061b29a6515273e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cgroup: Use separate src/dst nodes when preloading css_sets for migration
